channel.title: Simple question!
channel.description: I want to make a private server, but one just for myself. On this server I'd like to add all most of the games features possible. So it would be my own version I could just play alone sorta deal and skill 1 to 99 as slow/fast as I would in regular runescape. I'm a PC technician and I wouldn't have a problem writing my own scripts and setting it all up. To the point/question, What would I be getting myself into? By this i mean has it been done? Is it practical? Once I get started, and after I finish, I'll end up adding my own updates, fixing glitches, general maintenance and just enjoying my own version of the game. I think it would be fun to have all of the game alone do a slayer task and no ones around, it would give me that desolate relaxing feeling. I know my questions are not the greatest. I'm just looking for some opinions, facts. Please keep your negative comments to yourself by that I don't mean, for you to not serve me the cold hard truth and give me the facts. I mean don't tell me why it's a waste of time and what not. That covers it all!

item.title: Simple question!
item.dc:creator: @bowser bowser
item.description:
@bowser wrote:

I want to make a private server, but one just for myself. On this server I’d like to add all most of the games features possible. So it would be my own version I could just play alone sorta deal and skill 1 to 99 as slow/fast as I would in regular runescape. I’m a PC technician and I wouldn’t have a problem writing my own scripts and setting it all up. To the point/question, What would I be getting myself into?
By this i mean has it been done? Is it practical?
Once I get started, and after I finish, I’ll end up adding my own updates, fixing glitches, general maintenance and just enjoying my own version of the game.
I think it would be fun to have all of the game alone do a slayer task and no ones around, it would give me that desolate relaxing feeling.
I know my questions are not the greatest. I’m just looking for some opinions, facts.
Please keep your negative comments to yourself by that I don’t mean, for you to not serve me the cold hard truth and give me the facts. I mean don’t tell me why it’s a waste of time and what not.
That covers it all!
